channel.title: Eclipse Hono on Eclipse IoT
channel.description: Recent content in Eclipse Hono on Eclipse IoT

item.title: Eclipse Hono – Eclipse Hono : Connect. Command. Control.
item.description: The open source response to closed and proprietary IoT solutions is called Eclipse Hono!

item.title: How Eclipse Hono enables device-related communication for the IoT
item.description: Connectivity is at the heart of IoT solutions. Devices (things) need to be connected to a backend component where the data and functionality of the devices is leveraged to provide some higher level business value.…
